**![](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Nick-Haby-City-Administrator-06.2020-207200003web-240x300.jpg)
City Administrator**
,
[Nick Haby](mailto:cityadministrator@cityofmeadowsplace.org)

The mission of the City Administrator is to oversee the day to day departmental operations of the City of Meadows Place, and to implement and administer the Mayor and City Council’s policies, decisions, and strategic goals, including the City’s annual budget.  The City Administrator also works with the City Council, appointed boards and commissions, City Staff and residents to accomplish efficient and effective service levels that continue to keep Meadows Place a desirable and healthy community in which to live, work and visit.

Nick Haby has served with the City of Meadows Place since April 2020.  He comes to the City with more than 20 years experience across a broad spectrum of City management and administrative functions in award winning Texas municipalities.  Prior to joining Meadows Place, Nick served at the City of Missouri City in the Planning Department and City Manager’s offices before moving to Friendswood where he served as Assistant to the City Manager and later Planning Manager.  Nick most recently served as Community Development Director at the City of Kemah, where his accomplishments include a number of infrastructure and Capital projects, improved customer service functions, and organizational efficiencies and restructurings.

**![](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/AnnaMaria-Weston-Finance-Director-177540013web-240x300.jpg)**

,
[Anna-Maria Weston](mailto:meadowsaccountant@cityofmeadowsplace.org)
, manages and oversees the budgetary and audit processes. She also coordinates special projects.

**![](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/cameron-miller-240x300-EDC-Picture-REDO.jpg)**

,
[Cameron Miller](mailto:communications@cityofmeadowsplace.org)
is responsible for all communications, social media, and video production for the City of Meadows Place and Meadows Place Police. Cameron has been a resident of the City of Meadows place for over 8 years. Prior to working with the city, he worked in the television news industry for 20 years. He loves spending time with his family and is a graduate of the University of South Florida.

,
[Liliana Veruny](mailto:accounts@cityofmeadowsplace.org)
, oversees and coordinates accounts receivables and payables. She also assists the City Secretary with HR function, payroll and performs other acts and duties as the governing body requires.

,
[Isela Hernandez](mailto:permits@cityofmeadowsplace.org)
, coordinates the function of issuing permits & licenses  for residential and commercial improvements. She assists the public with notary services and performs many other duties.

,
[Jackie McCordic](mailto:utilities@cityofmeadowsplace.org)
, is responsible for residential and commercial utility billing and services. Along with this assignment goes many other associated areas such as deposits of monies received, records management, resolving customer complaints, and meter change outs.  She also assists the public with notary services and performs many other duties.

**Court Administrator
[Tiffany Poke](mailto:courtclerk@cityofmeadowsplace.org)
and Deputy Court Clerk**
[Y’Mica Davis](mailto:court@cityofmeadowsplace.org)
, oversee all aspects of this sub-department. Instruction on how to take a Defensive Driving Course and Deferred Disposition is provided as well as the option of having trials by Judge or by Jury. They also coordinates the collections of fees and the delinquent process.
